src_original: taiścāpyadhigataṃ dharmaṃ saṃsārabhayanāśanam /  śaraṇaṃ yāmi bhāvena bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tathā // SBca_2.49 //
samantabhadrāyātmānaṃ dadāmi bhayavihvalaḥ /  punaśca mañjughoṣāya dadāmyātmānamātmanā // SBca_2.50 //
viraumyārtaravaṃ bhītaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pāpinam // SBca_2.51 //
yaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃtrastāḥ palāyante caturdiśam /
